opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Riley, Interim District Director, Bureau of Immigration and Customs Enforcement v. Radoncic

opinion:
538 U.S. 1010

RILEY, INTERIM DISTRICT DIRECTOR, BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT
v.
RADONCIC.

No. 01-1459.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 5, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE THIRD CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 3d Cir. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Demore v. Kim, ante, p. 510. Reported below: 28 Fed. Appx. 113.
